comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Google Analytics added in revision 612189 and will go to the live site later today before the 1.4 announcement.

description:
I'd like to add Google Analytics to our web site to better track how the site is used and how much traffic we are generating.

Currently the best stats we have are at http://people.apache.org/~vgritsenko/stats/projects/jackrabbit.html, which is nice but not nearly as good as we could have.
summary: Add Google Analytics to Jackrabbit web site
